name: Painkiller
description: Yes, it's kinda fruity, and yes, you're venturing into umbrella-drink territory; but we're at the dawn of summer—it's okay to put on your flowered shirt and relax a little bit. A Painkiller can help you shake out whatever winter stiffness remains, and prepare you for the long, hot months ahead.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well with ice. Strain into a tall glass or—what the hell—a tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Dust the top with nutmeg, spear with a straw and garnish with a pineapple stick, an orange wheel, and/or a cinnamon stick.

* Just can’t find Pusser’s, or don’t feel like buying it just for this drink? Well, if you must substitute, go with another rich, dark, heavy rum like Gosling’s, but keep in mind that it just won’t be quite the same thing.
